Built with Alectryon, running Lean4 v4.7.0. Bubbles () indicate interactive fragments: hover for details, tap to reveal contents. Use Ctrl+↑ Ctrl+↓ to navigate, Ctrl+🖱️ to focus. On Mac, use ⌘ instead of Ctrl.
/-
 - Created in 2024 by Gaëtan Serré
-/

/-
- https://github.com/gaetanserre/SBS-Proofs
-/

import Mathlib.Data.Real.EReal
import Mathlib.Analysis.InnerProductSpace.Basic
import Mathlib.MeasureTheory.Measure.Lebesgue.Basic
import Mathlib.MeasureTheory.Integral.Bochner

import SBSProofs.Utils
import SBSProofs.PushForward
import SBSProofs.RKHS

local macro_rules | `($x ^ $y) => `(HPow.hPow $x $y)

open scoped RealInnerProductSpace
open BigOperators Finset ENNReal NNReal MeasureTheory RKHS

set_option trace.Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite true
set_option maxHeartbeats 400000

/-
  We defined measures μ and π (ν is considered as the standard Lebesgue measure) along with their densities (finite and non-zero on the entire space)
-/
variable {d : ℕ} (hd : d ≠ 0) {Ω : Set (Vector ℝ d)}

variable [MeasureSpace Ω]

variable (μ π ν : Measure Ω) [IsFiniteMeasure μ] [IsFiniteMeasure π] (dμ dπ : Ω → ℝ≥0∞)

/-
  μ << π << ν, they both admit density w.r.t. ν.
-/
variable (_h1 : absolutely_continuous μ π) (_h2 : absolutely_continuous π ν)
example : absolutely_continuous μ ν := absolutely_continuous_trans _h1 _h2

variable (hμ : is_density μ ν dμ) (hπ : is_density π ν dπ) (mdμ : Measurable dμ) (mdπ : Measurable dπ) (hdμ : ∀x, dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ∞) (hdπ : ∀x, dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ∞)


variable [IsProbabilityMeasure μ] [IsProbabilityMeasure π]

/-
  We define a RKHS of Ω → ℝ functions.
-/
variable (H₀ : Set (Ω → ℝ)) [NormedAddCommGroup H₀] [InnerProductSpace ℝ H₀] [s : RKHS H₀]

/--
We consider that the left-hand side of the equivalence holds for all x. In the future, we want to take into account that it only holds for almost all x w.r.t. μ.
-/
def positive_definite_kernel := ∀ (f : range d → Ω → ℝ), (0 ≤ ∫ x in Set.univ, (∫ x' in Set.univ, (∑ i ∈ Set.univ, f i x * s.k x x' * f i x') ∂μ) ∂μ) ∧ (∫ x in Set.univ, (∫ x' in Set.univ, (∑ i ∈ Set.univ, f i x * s.k x x' * f i x') ∂μ) ∂μ = 0 ↔ ∀i, ∀x, f i x = 0)

variable (h_kernel_positive : positive_definite_kernel μ H₀)

/-===============================KERNEL STEIN DISCREPANCY===============================-/
/-
Here, we prove that KSD(μ | π) is a valid discrepancy measure and that π is the only fixed point of Φₜ(μ).
-/

/-
  From here, as the derivative of multivariate function are hard to define and to manipulate (defining the gradient, the divergence...), we define the gradient of *f* as follows:
  f  : Ω → ℝ
  df : range d → Ω → ℝ
       i ↦ x ↦ ∂xⁱ f(x)

  For vector-valued function, we defined them as follows:
  f  : range d → Ω → ℝ
       i ↦ x ↦ f(x)ⁱ
  df : range d → Ω → ℝ
       i ↦ x ↦ ∂xⁱ f(x)ⁱ

  Also, we assume some simple lemmas using the above formalism. Sometimes, these lemmas are not rigorously defined but, in our framework, it is more than enough.
-/

/- dk : x ↦ i ↦ y ↦ ∂xⁱ k(x, y) -/
variable (dk : Ω → range d → Ω → ℝ)

/- d_ln_π : i ↦ x ↦ ∂xⁱ ln (μ(x) / π(x)) -/
variable (d_ln_π : range d → Ω → ℝ)

/-
  Definition of the steepest direction ϕ and its derivative.
-/
variable (ϕ : product_RKHS H₀ hd) (dϕ : range d → Ω → ℝ)

/- We will use this assumption only when the function is trivially integrable (e.g. derivative of integrable functions). -/
variable (is_integrable_H₀ : ∀ (f : Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ)

/-
d_ln_π_μ : i ↦ x ↦ ∂xⁱ ln (π(x) / μ(x))
-/
variable (d_ln_π_μ : range d → Ω → ℝ)

/-
Simple derivative rule: if the derivative is 0 ∀x, then the function is constant.
-/
variable (hd_ln_π_μ : (∀i, ∀x, d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → (∃ c, ∀ x, log (dμ x / dπ x) = c))

/-
dπ' : i ↦ x ↦ ∂xⁱ π(x)
-/
variable (dπ' : range d → Ω → ℝ)

/-
Simple derivative rule: ∂xⁱ ln (π(x)) * π(x) = ∂xⁱ π(x).
-/
variable (hπ' : ∀x, ∀i, ENNReal.toReal (dπ x) * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x)


variable [Norm Ω]
/--
  Stein class of measure. f is in the Stein class of μ if, ∀i ∈ Set.univ, lim_(‖x‖ → ∞) μ(x) * ϕ(x)ⁱ = 0.
-/
def SteinClass (f : range d → Ω → ℝ) (dμ : Ω → ℝ≥0∞) := ∀ x, tends_to_infty (fun (x : Ω) ↦ ‖x‖) → ∀i, ENNReal.toReal (dμ x) * f i x = 0


/-
  Kernel Stein Discrepancy
-/
variable (KSD : Measure Ω → Measure Ω → ℝ)

/--
KSD(μ | π) = ⟪∇ln π/μ, Pμ ∇ln π/μ⟫_L²(μ). We assume here that KSD is also equal to ∫ x, ∑ i ∈ Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ϕ i x + dϕ i x) ∂μ.
-/
def is_ksd := KSD μ π = (∫ x in Set.univ, (∫ x' in Set.univ, (∑ i ∈ Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * s.k x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x') ∂μ) ∂μ) ∧ (KSD μ π = ∫ x, ∑ i ∈ Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * (ϕ i).1 x + dϕ i x) ∂μ)

/-
  KSD(μ | π) is originally defined as ‖ϕ^⋆‖²_H, it is therefore non-negative.
-/
def is_ksd_norm := KSD μ π = ‖ϕ‖^2

/-
  ϕ is in the Stein class of π
-/
variable (hstein : SteinClass (λ i ↦ (ϕ i).1) dπ)

/--
  We show that, if ϕ is in the Stein class of π, KSD is a valid discrepancy measure i.e. μ = π ↔ KSD(μ | π) = 0.
-/
lemma KSD_is_valid_discrepancy (hksd : is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD) : μ = π ↔ KSD μ π = 0 :=

Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
μ = π ↔ KSD μ π = 0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0

inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π

_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ

hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π

dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
mp
μ = π → KSD μ π = 0

mp
μ = π → KSD μ π = 0

    -- μ = π ↦ KSD(μ | π) = 0.

h: μ = π

hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
KSD μ π = 0 → μ = π
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
mp
KSD μ π = 0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π

inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀

mp

    -- ∑ i, f i + g i = ∑ i, f i + ∑ i, g i.

hπ: is_density π ν dπ

dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) ∂μ = 0

hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c

hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) ∂μ = 0
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] split_sum:1000, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ,
      (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x +
        dϕ i x) ==> ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x

hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ

h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x ∂μ = 0

dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x ∂μ = 0


    -- Split the integral of sum into sum of integral.
    
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x ∂μ = 0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
mp
μ = π → KSD μ π = 0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
KSD μ π = 0 → μ = π
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x ∂μ = 0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π

is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x

dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x ∂μ = 0

Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
mp
∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ + ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂μ =
  0

hd: d ≠ 0

d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
mp
∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ + ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂μ =
  0


    -- Make the `Set.univ` appears for using the density later.

inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π

inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
mp
∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ + ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂μ =
  0
Goals accomplished! 🐙

hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π

_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ

hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π

inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @Set.toFinset_univ:1000, Set.toFinset Set.univ ==> Finset.univ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @Finset.mem_range:1000, x ∈ Finset.range d ==> x < d
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @nonempty_subtype:1000, Nonempty { x // x < d } ==> ∃ a, a < d
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @isEmpty_subtype:1000, IsEmpty { x // x < d } ==> ∀ (x : ℕ), ¬x < d
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @not_lt:1000, ¬x < d ==> d ≤ x
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] not_isEmpty_of_nonempty:1000, IsEmpty ℕ ==> False
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] not_isEmpty_of_nonempty:1000, IsEmpty ℕ ==> False
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @Finset.univ_unique:1000, has unassigned metavariables after unification
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @Finset.univ_eq_attach:1000, Finset.univ ==> Finset.attach (Finset.range d)
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @MeasureTheory.Measure.restrict_univ:1000, μ.restrict Set.univ ==> μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ x ∈ Finset.attach (Finset.range d), d_ln_π x a * ↑(ϕ x) a ∂μ =
      ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ x ∈ Finset.attach (Finset.range d), d_ln_π x a * ↑(ϕ x) a ∂μ ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
mp
μ = π → KSD μ π = 0

KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mp
∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ + ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂μ =
  0

hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mp
∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂μ =
  0

h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀

d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mp
∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂μ =
  0


    -- Replace μ by π in the integration.∈

h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mp

    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂μ =
  0

    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x

h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ

  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mp

  0

dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mp
∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂π +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0


    -- Replace by its density.
    
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mp
∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂π +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0

ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c

hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0


    -- Get ENNReal.toReal (dπ x) in the sum (a * ∑ b = ∑ b * a).

inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π

  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x

  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0
Goals accomplished! 🐙

μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞

hπ: is_density π ν dπ

inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π

  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x

  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal

  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =

hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mul_dist_sum: ∀ (a : ℝ) (f : { x // x ∈ range d } → ℝ), (∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, f i) * a = ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, f i * a
∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)

  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x

  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ

x: ↑Ω
(∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i) * (dπ x).toReal =
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙

μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀

h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω

hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
mp
μ = π → KSD μ π = 0

μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω

inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π

_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ

mdπ: Measurable dπ

hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤

ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd

hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c

Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mul_dist: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] mul_dist:1000, (dπ x).toReal *
      ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ,
        d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x ==> ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal

inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mul_dist: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x * (dπ x).toReal ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0

d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mul_dist: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x * (dπ x).toReal ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0


    -- Make the product ENNReal.toReal (dπ x) * d_ln_π i x appears to use the ln derivative rule.
    
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mul_dist: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
mul_comm: ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x * (dπ x).toReal = (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x * (dπ x).toReal ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
mp
μ = π → KSD μ π = 0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
KSD μ π = 0 → μ = π
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mul_dist: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
mul_comm: ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x * (dπ x).toReal = (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x * (dπ x).toReal ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] mul_comm:1000, d_ln_π x x✝ * ↑(ϕ x) x✝ *
      (dπ x✝).toReal ==> (dπ x✝).toReal * d_ln_π x x✝ * ↑(ϕ x) x✝
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0

dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ

  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mul_dist: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
mul_comm: ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x * (dπ x).toReal = (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x * (dπ x).toReal ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0

h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x

  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ

  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal

mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0

    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal

mp

  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x

  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ

    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal

mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dπ' x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0

split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mul_dist: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
mul_comm: ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x * (dπ x).toReal = (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dπ' x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0


    -- Make the `Set.univ` appears to use the density.
    
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mul_dist: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
mul_comm: ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x * (dπ x).toReal = (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dπ' x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mul_dist: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
mul_comm: ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x * (dπ x).toReal = (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x
∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π = ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @Set.toFinset_univ:1000, Set.toFinset Set.univ ==> Finset.univ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @Finset.mem_range:1000, x ∈ Finset.range d ==> x < d
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @nonempty_subtype:1000, Nonempty { x // x < d } ==> ∃ a, a < d
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @isEmpty_subtype:1000, IsEmpty { x // x < d } ==> ∀ (x : ℕ), ¬x < d
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @not_lt:1000, ¬x < d ==> d ≤ x
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] not_isEmpty_of_nonempty:1000, IsEmpty ℕ ==> False
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] not_isEmpty_of_nonempty:1000, IsEmpty ℕ ==> False
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @Finset.univ_unique:1000, has unassigned metavariables after unification
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @Finset.univ_eq_attach:1000, Finset.univ ==> Finset.attach (Finset.range d)
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @MeasureTheory.Measure.restrict_univ:1000, π.restrict Set.univ ==> π
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ x ∈ Finset.attach (Finset.range d), dϕ x a ∂π =
      ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ x ∈ Finset.attach (Finset.range d), dϕ x a ∂π ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙

hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
mp
μ = π → KSD μ π = 0

hd: d ≠ 0

μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω

inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞

hπ: is_density π ν dπ

H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀

s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd

is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x

hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
KSD μ π = 0 → μ = π

dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ

  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ

  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
mul_comm: ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x * (dπ x).toReal = (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π = ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dπ' x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0

    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x

h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ

  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ

  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =

mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dπ' x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0

hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ✝: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mul_dist: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
mul_comm: ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x * (dπ x).toReal = (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π = ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dπ' x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
mp
μ = π → KSD μ π = 0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞

_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν

hπ: is_density π ν dπ

ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd

is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

KSD μ π = 0 → μ = π

ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c

  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x

h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ✝: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mul_dist: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
mul_comm: ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x * (dπ x).toReal = (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π = ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dπ' x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x ∂ν +
    ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π =
  0

    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x

  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ

  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal

mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dπ' x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x ∂ν +
    ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x ∂ν =
  0

  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal

int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π = ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dπ' x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x ∂ν +
    ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x ∂ν =
  0


    -- Use the integration by parts on the right-hand side integral.

hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)

    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x

h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ

  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ

  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal

mp

    ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x ∂ν =
  0

inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π

inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π

inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀

h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ✝: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mul_dist: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
mul_comm: ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x * (dπ x).toReal = (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π = ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dπ' x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x ∂ν +
    -∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dπ' i x * ↑(ϕ i) x ∂ν =
  0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: μ = π
split_sum: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + dϕ i x) =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x + ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x
h1: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) μ
h2: Integrable (fun x => ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i x) μ
int_univ✝: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ =
  ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π i a * ↑(ϕ i) a ∂μ
mul_dist: ∀ (x : ↑Ω),
  (dπ x).toReal * ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i =
    ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, (fun i => d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x) i * (dπ x).toReal
mul_comm: ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x * (dπ x).toReal = (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x * ↑(ϕ i) x
int_univ: ∫ (a : ↑Ω), ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π = ∫ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dϕ i a ∂π
mp
∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ x_1 ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dπ' x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x ∂ν +
    -∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, dπ' i x * ↑(ϕ i) x ∂ν =
  0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
mp
μ = π → KSD μ π = 0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
