mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
KSD μ π = 0 → μ = π
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @MeasureTheory.Measure.restrict_univ:1000, ν.restrict Set.univ ==> ν
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @Set.toFinset_univ:1000, Set.toFinset Set.univ ==> Finset.univ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @Finset.mem_range:1000, x ∈ Finset.range d ==> x < d
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @nonempty_subtype:1000, Nonempty { x // x < d } ==> ∃ a, a < d
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @isEmpty_subtype:1000, IsEmpty { x // x < d } ==> ∀ (x : ℕ), ¬x < d
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @not_lt:1000, ¬x < d ==> d ≤ x
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] not_isEmpty_of_nonempty:1000, IsEmpty ℕ ==> False
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] not_isEmpty_of_nonempty:1000, IsEmpty ℕ ==> False
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @Finset.univ_unique:1000, has unassigned metavariables after unification
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @Finset.univ_eq_attach:1000, Finset.univ ==> Finset.attach (Finset.range d)
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @add_right_neg:1000, ∫ (x : ↑Ω),
        ∑ x_1 ∈ Finset.attach (Finset.range d), dπ' x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x ∂ν +
      -∫ (x : ↑Ω), ∑ x_1 ∈ Finset.attach (Finset.range d), dπ' x_1 x * ↑(ϕ x_1) x ∂ν ==> 0
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, 0 = 0 ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π

hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ

inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π

KSD μ π = 0 → μ = π

    -- KSD(μ | π) = 0 ↦ μ = π.

inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ

mdπ: Measurable dπ

hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: KSD μ π = 0
mpr
μ = π
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
mpr
μ = π

μ = π


    -- We use the fact that the kernel is positive-definite that implies that d_ln_π_μ = 0.

dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ

    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
mpr
μ = π


    -- Simple derivative rule: ∂x f x = 0 → f x = c

inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
hd_ln_π_μ: ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
mpr

    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0

c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
mpr.intro
μ = π

    -- We show that, since dμ x / dπ x ≠ 0 and finite, dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x.

hd: d ≠ 0

hπ: is_density π ν dπ

μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π

_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ

mdπ: Measurable dπ

inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀

ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd

KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
x: ↑Ω
h: log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
frac_pos: 0 < dμ x / dπ x
dμ x / dπ x ≠ 0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω

KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝¹: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
x: ↑Ω
h✝: log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
frac_neq_zero: dμ x / dπ x ≠ 0
h: dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x = 0 ∨ dμ x = ⊤ ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
False
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ

ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
x: ↑Ω
h: log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
frac_neq_zero: dμ x / dπ x ≠ 0
hpl: dμ x ≠ 0
hpr: dπ x = 0
inl.intro
False
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

hp: dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x = 0

d: ℕ

Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
x: ↑Ω
h: log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
frac_neq_zero: dμ x / dπ x ≠ 0
frac_finite: dμ x / dπ x ≠ ⊤
cancel_ln_exp: dμ x / dπ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c)
dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] ← cancel_ln_exp:1000, ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ==> dμ x / dπ x
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @ENNReal.div_eq_inv_mul:1000, dμ x / dπ x ==> (dπ x)⁻¹ * dμ x
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] mul_right_comm (dπ x)⁻¹ (dμ x) (dπ x):1000, (dπ x)⁻¹ * dμ x * dπ x ==> (dπ x)⁻¹ * dπ x * dμ x
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] ENNReal.inv_mul_cancel (hdπ x).left (hdπ x).right:1000, (dπ x)⁻¹ * dπ x ==> 1
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @one_mul:1000, 1 * dμ x ==> dμ x
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, dμ x = dμ x ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙


    -- We show by contradiction that ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) = 1. If it is ≠ 1, this implies a contradiction as dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x and ∫⁻ x, dμ x ∂ν = 1.
    
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π

mpr.intro
μ = π

    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =

dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
hc: ¬ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) = 1
False

is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) = 1
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
hc: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ≠ 1
False

hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD

    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =

hc: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ≠ 1
∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, 1 ∂μ = 1
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @MeasureTheory.Measure.restrict_univ:1000, μ.restrict Set.univ ==> μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @nonempty_subtype:1000, Nonempty ↑Ω ==> ∃ a, a ∈ Ω
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @isEmpty_subtype:1000, IsEmpty ↑Ω ==> ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), x ∉ Ω
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] not_isEmpty_of_nonempty:1000, IsEmpty (Vector ℝ d) ==> False
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @MeasureTheory.lintegral_const:1000, ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω), 1 ∂μ ==> 1 * ↑↑μ Set.univ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @MeasureTheory.measure_univ:1000, ↑↑μ Set.univ ==> 1
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @mul_one:1000, 1 * 1 ==> 1
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, 1 = 1 ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙

inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ

mdπ: Measurable dπ

hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
hc: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ≠ 1
univ_eq_one_μ: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, 1 ∂μ = 1
False
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
hc: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ≠ 1
univ_eq_one_μ: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, 1 ∂μ = 1
False
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
hc: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ≠ 1
univ_eq_one_μ: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, 1 ∂μ = 1
∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, 1 ∂π = 1
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @MeasureTheory.Measure.restrict_univ:1000, π.restrict Set.univ ==> π
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @nonempty_subtype:1000, Nonempty ↑Ω ==> ∃ a, a ∈ Ω
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @isEmpty_subtype:1000, IsEmpty ↑Ω ==> ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), x ∉ Ω
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] not_isEmpty_of_nonempty:1000, IsEmpty (Vector ℝ d) ==> False
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @MeasureTheory.lintegral_const:1000, ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω), 1 ∂π ==> 1 * ↑↑π Set.univ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @MeasureTheory.measure_univ:1000, ↑↑π Set.univ ==> 1
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @mul_one:1000, 1 * 1 ==> 1
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, 1 = 1 ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙

hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω

hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ

mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤

dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0

ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) = 1

d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
hc: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ≠ 1
univ_eq_one_μ: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, dμ x * 1 ∂ν = 1
univ_eq_one_π: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, 1 ∂π = 1
False
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) = 1

hc: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ≠ 1
univ_eq_one_μ: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, dμ x * 1 ∂ν = 1
univ_eq_one_π: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, 1 ∂π = 1
False
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] dμ_propor:1000, dμ x ==> ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x

inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ

mdπ: Measurable dπ

hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤

inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) = 1
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
hc: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ≠ 1
univ_eq_one_π: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, 1 ∂π = 1
univ_eq_one_μ: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x ∂ν = 1
False

is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
hc: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ≠ 1
univ_eq_one_π: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, dπ x * 1 ∂ν = 1
univ_eq_one_μ: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x ∂ν = 1
False

is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x

KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD

    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0

hc: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ≠ 1
univ_eq_one_π: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, dπ x * 1 ∂ν = 1
univ_eq_one_μ: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x ∂ν = 1

dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x

KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0

hc: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ≠ 1
univ_eq_one_π: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, dπ x * 1 ∂ν = 1
univ_eq_one_μ: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x ∂ν = 1

dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c

s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
hc: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ≠ 1
univ_eq_one_π: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, dπ x * 1 ∂ν = 1
univ_eq_one_μ: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x ∂ν = 1
False
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @mul_one:1000, dπ x * 1 ==> dπ x
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
hc: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ≠ 1
univ_eq_one_μ: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x ∂ν = 1
univ_eq_one_π: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, dπ x ∂ν = 1
False
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀

ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
hc: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ≠ 1
univ_eq_one_μ: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x ∂ν = 1
univ_eq_one_π: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, dπ x ∂ν = 1

h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
hc: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ≠ 1
univ_eq_one_μ: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * ∫⁻ (a : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, dπ a ∂ν = 1
univ_eq_one_π: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, dπ x ∂ν = 1
False

inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) * dπ x
hc: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) ≠ 1
univ_eq_one_μ: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) = 1
univ_eq_one_π: ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, dπ x ∂ν = 1
False
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π

    -- We rewrite μ = π as ∀s, ∫⁻ x in s, dμ ∂ν = ∀s, ∫⁻ x in s, dπ ∂ν and use dμ = 1 * dπ.

hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π

_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ

mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤

dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0

hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD

    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =

exp_c_eq_one: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) = 1
mpr.intro
μ = π
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @one_mul:1000, 1 * dπ x ==> dπ x

s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
exp_c_eq_one: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) = 1
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = dπ x
mpr.intro
μ = π
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π

hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
mpr
KSD μ π = 0 → μ = π
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π

hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
exp_c_eq_one: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) = 1
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = dπ x

mpr.intro.h
∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in s, dμ x * 1 ∂ν = ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in s, dπ x * 1 ∂ν
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @mul_one:1000, dμ x * 1 ==> dμ x
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @mul_one:1000, dπ x * 1 ==> dπ x

KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
exp_c_eq_one: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) = 1
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = dπ x
s: Set ↑Ω
_hs: MeasurableSet s
mpr.intro.h
∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in s, dμ x ∂ν = ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in s, dπ x ∂ν
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s✝: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ, dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
h✝: ∫ (x : ↑Ω) in Set.univ,
    ∫ (x' : ↑Ω) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ Set.toFinset Set.univ, d_ln_π_μ i x * k H₀ x x' * d_ln_π_μ i x' ∂μ ∂μ =
  0
d_ln_π_μ_eq_0: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0
c: ℝ
h: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
exp_c_eq_one: ENNReal.ofReal (Real.exp c) = 1
dμ_propor: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x = dπ x
s: Set ↑Ω
_hs: MeasurableSet s
mpr.intro.h
∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in s, dμ x * 1 ∂ν = ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in s, dπ x * 1 ∂ν
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] dμ_propor:1000, dμ x ==> dπ x
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in s, dπ x ∂ν = ∫⁻ (x : ↑Ω) in s, dπ x ∂ν ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙


/--
  π is the only fixed point of Φₜ(μ). We proved that by showing that, if μ = π, ϕ^* = 0 and ϕ^* ≠ 0 otherwise.
-/
lemma π_unique_fixed_point (hksd : is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD) (ksd_norm : is_ksd_norm hd μ π H₀ ϕ KSD) : (μ = π → ∀ i, ϕ i = 0) ∧ (μ ≠ π → ∃ i, ϕ i ≠ 0) :=

Goals accomplished! 🐙

hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)

μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω

inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π

hμ: is_density μ ν dμ

dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
ksd_norm: is_ksd_norm hd μ π H₀ ϕ KSD
KSD_discrepancy: μ = π ↔ KSD μ π = 0
left
μ = π → ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), ϕ i = 0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ

ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω

μ ≠ π → ∃ i, ϕ i ≠ 0

hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
ksd_norm: is_ksd_norm hd μ π H₀ ϕ KSD
KSD_discrepancy: μ = π ↔ KSD μ π = 0
μ ≠ π → ∃ i, ϕ i ≠ 0
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
ksd_norm: is_ksd_norm hd μ π H₀ ϕ KSD
KSD_discrepancy: μ = π ↔ KSD μ π = 0
right
μ ≠ π → ∃ i, ϕ i ≠ 0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
ksd_norm: is_ksd_norm hd μ π H₀ ϕ KSD
(μ = π → ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), ϕ i = 0) ∧ (μ ≠ π → ∃ i, ϕ i ≠ 0)
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
ksd_norm: is_ksd_norm hd μ π H₀ ϕ KSD
KSD_discrepancy: μ = π ↔ KSD μ π = 0
right
μ ≠ π → ∃ i, ϕ i ≠ 0

    -- μ ≠ π → ϕ^* ≠ 0
    
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
ksd_norm: is_ksd_norm hd μ π H₀ ϕ KSD
KSD_discrepancy: μ = π ↔ KSD μ π = 0
μ_neq_π: μ ≠ π
right
∃ i, ϕ i ≠ 0

hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
ksd_norm: is_ksd_norm hd μ π H₀ ϕ KSD
KSD_discrepancy: μ = π ↔ KSD μ π = 0
right
μ ≠ π → ∃ i, ϕ i ≠ 0

μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
ksd_norm: is_ksd_norm hd μ π H₀ ϕ KSD
KSD_discrepancy: μ = π ↔ KSD μ π = 0
μ_neq_π: μ ≠ π
h: ¬∃ i, ϕ i ≠ 0
right
False

h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀

is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
ksd_norm: is_ksd_norm hd μ π H₀ ϕ KSD
KSD_discrepancy: μ = π ↔ KSD μ π = 0
right
μ ≠ π → ∃ i, ϕ i ≠ 0
d: ℕ
hd: d ≠ 0
Ω: Set (Vector ℝ d)
inst✝⁷: MeasureSpace ↑Ω
μ, π, ν: Measure ↑Ω
inst✝⁶: IsFiniteMeasure μ
inst✝⁵: IsFiniteMeasure π
dμ, dπ: ↑Ω → ℝ≥0∞
_h1: absolutely_continuous μ π
_h2: absolutely_continuous π ν
hμ: is_density μ ν dμ
hπ: is_density π ν dπ
mdμ: Measurable dμ
mdπ: Measurable dπ
hdμ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dμ x ≠ 0 ∧ dμ x ≠ ⊤
hdπ: ∀ (x : ↑Ω), dπ x ≠ 0 ∧ dπ x ≠ ⊤
inst✝⁴: IsProbabilityMeasure μ
inst✝³: IsProbabilityMeasure π
H₀: Set (↑Ω → ℝ)
inst✝²: NormedAddCommGroup ↑H₀
inst✝¹: InnerProductSpace ℝ ↑H₀
s: RKHS H₀
h_kernel_positive: positive_definite_kernel μ H₀
dk: ↑Ω → { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
d_ln_π: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
ϕ: product_RKHS H₀ hd
dϕ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
is_integrable_H₀: ∀ (f : ↑Ω → ℝ), Integrable f μ
d_ln_π_μ: { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hd_ln_π_μ: (∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }) (x : ↑Ω), d_ln_π_μ i x = 0) → ∃ c, ∀ (x : ↑Ω), log (dμ x / dπ x) = c
dπ': { x // x ∈ range d } → ↑Ω → ℝ
hπ': ∀ (x : ↑Ω) (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), (dπ x).toReal * d_ln_π i x = dπ' i x
inst✝: Norm ↑Ω
KSD: Measure ↑Ω → Measure ↑Ω → ℝ
hstein: SteinClass (fun i => ↑(ϕ i)) dπ
hksd: is_ksd hd μ π H₀ d_ln_π ϕ dϕ d_ln_π_μ KSD
ksd_norm: is_ksd_norm hd μ π H₀ ϕ KSD
KSD_discrepancy: μ = π ↔ KSD μ π = 0
μ_neq_π: μ ≠ π
h: ∀ (i : { x // x ∈ range d }), ϕ i = 0
right
False
